entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lytton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lytton 6:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -2.0°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 39 %

Dewpoint: -14.2°C

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
